metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10020 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the function Splash::scaleImageYuXu at Splash.cc for x Bresenham parameters.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> in poppler, this was known as CVE-2017-14520 ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: poppler: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
